alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, north central Whitfield, northwestern Walker and central Dade Counties through 515 PM EST... At 445 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Rossville to near Morganville to Higdon, and moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Chickamauga, Varnell, Lookout Mountain, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, Lakeview, Indian Springs, Graysville, Blue Spring, Fairview, Boynton, Beaumont, Chattanooga Valley, Cloudland Canyon State Park, Cooper Heights and Rock Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
